abstract: The European Central Bank president said that lending was still weak, but he expressed restrained optimism about growth.
snippet: The European Central Bank president said that lending was still weak, but he expressed restrained optimism about growth.
lead_paragraph: Borrowing by European companies showed signs of stabilizing in August, according to data released Monday that the European Central Bank president said signaled “a little more dynamism” in a crucial component of the economy.

headline.main: Corporate Loans in Europe Fell Less Steeply in August
headline.print_headline: Corporate Loans in Europe Fell Less Steeply in August

abstract: Borrowing by European companies showed signs of stabilizing in August, according to data released Monday by the European Central Bank, although analysts said that a turning point was “still more wish than reality.”
snippet: Borrowing by European companies showed signs of stabilizing in August, according to data released Monday by the European Central Bank, although analysts said that a turning point was “still more wish than reality.”
lead_paragraph: Borrowing by European companies showed signs of stabilizing in August, according to data released Monday that the European Central Bank president said signaled “a little more dynamism” in a crucial component of the economy.

headline.main: Corporate Loans in Europe Fell Less Steeply in August
